```{r}
  WI         = c(0, 1, 0, 0, 0),
  SQ         = c(1, 0, 0, 0, 0),
  MR         = c(0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  FW         = c(0, 0, 0, 0, 1),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

datatable(survey_summary)
```
